2.title: FAQ
2.spr_content: ### Dwarves Foundation Overview<hr />- **Pronunciation of 'Dwarf':** Challenging for non-English speakers, phonetically /dwɔːf/ resembles 'đ-tr-ô-p.'<hr />- **Theme Song:** Suggested but unofficial; "DragonForce - Three Hammers."<hr />- **Core Value:** Software Craftsmanship.<hr />- **Mission:** Empower Innovation through Software Craftsmanship.<hr />- **HR Structure:** No formal HR; Ops team handles hiring and training; admin manages paperwork.<hr />- **Working Hours:** Emphasis on quality over quantity; suggested hours from 8 AM to 5 PM.<hr />- **Dress Code:** No strict policy; maintain cleanliness and appropriateness in attire.<hr /><hr />### Employee Support<hr />- **Proof of Income:** Support for bank documentation; available in US and Vietnam contract formats.<hr />- **Accessing Email:** Google Mail service used; alias activation through Ops team.<hr />- **Education Allowance:** $300 annual stipend for professional growth; eligibility after 6 months.<hr /><hr />### Health Benefits<hr />- **Bao Minh Insurance:** Provided post-probation; eligibility based on contribution; features virtual cards for easier access.<hr />- **Claim Process:** Online submission guidelines exist; can use any USD-capable banking service.<hr />- **Payment Delays:** Report delays through support channels.<hr /><hr />### Project Operations<hr />- **Project Information:** Accessible through Fortress; employee-driven participation encouraged.<hr />- **Career Path:** Six levels of mastery outlined; monthly all-hands meeting for updates.<hr />- **Project Bonuses:** Monthly distribution post-client payment; based on participation and contribution.<hr /><hr />### Referral Program<hr />- **Bonus Criteria:** Tied to the referred employee's integration and contribution; aims to uphold project quality standards.

3.title: Hybrid working at Dwarves
3.description: Dwarves HQ is in Saigon, but we proudly embrace a flexible hybrid working culture. The Foundation fully supports team members in choosing their ideal work environment. Whether you're local or abroad, you're always welcome to work remotely or visit Saigon and use the office as needed.
3.spr_content: - **Embrace Hybrid Work**: Flexible culture encourages a blend of remote and in-office work. <hr />- **Ideal Start**: One or two days at the office recommended for optimal productivity.<hr />- **Office Characteristics**: Designed to minimize distractions, ensure comfort, and maximize functionality.<hr />- **Home vs. Office**: Difficulty concentrating at home; office provides essential resources for productivity.<hr />- **Equipment and Amenities**: Equipped with Apple Studio Displays, Herman Miller chairs, dedicated desks, meeting rooms, tranquility settings, high-speed internet, and 24/7 access.<hr />- **Support for Employees**: Offers parking and meal subsidies (lunch and dinner).<hr />- **Location Flexibility**: Saigon HQ offers remote work options; welcomes local and international team members to use the office.<hr />- **Benefits of Office Presence**: <hr />  - Enhances work-life boundaries, promoting focus during work hours.<hr />  - Reduces home interruptions by establishing clear work time for family.<hr />  - Access to advanced office resources aids productivity.<hr />- **Cultivating Ideal Environment**: Focus on comfort and functionality, fostering a 'Lite' culture.<hr />- **Hado Hub**: Serves as a productive alternative workspace, resembling a second home.<hr />- **Future of Work**: Office roles evolving; hybrid work model seen as the norm, promoting freedom to work efficiently regardless of location. <hr />- **Commitment to Flexibility**: Focus on empowering employees to perform their best, wherever they choose to work.

4.title: Evolutionary Database Design: Managing Change and Scaling with the System
4.description: As systems scale to meet growing demands, databases must evolve alongside them to maintain performance and integrity. This document explores best practices for managing database changes, maintaining knowledge, and ensuring smooth integration. Topics covered include knowledge sharing, repository structuring, continuous integration, and database refactoring, with real-world examples illustrating their application.
4.spr_content: - Public asset management app crucial for city resource tracking faces scalability challenges.<hr />- Growth leads to increased user demands, complex datasets, and regulatory pressures.<hr />- Performance issues and inconsistency threaten data reliability and user confidence.<hr />- Database design may outgrow initial assumptions, necessitating schema adaptations.<hr />- Poor repository management complicates tracking changes, risking data consistency.<hr />- Integration issues arise as services may rely on conflicting database versions.<hr />- Refactoring must be handled carefully to avoid widespread system impacts.<hr />- Solutions to safeguard growth should focus on knowledge sharing, structured management, continuous integration, and controlled refactoring.<hr /><hr />Evolutionary Database Design:<hr />- Ensures efficient database changes without disrupting dependencies.<hr />- Knowledge sharing fosters collaboration between DBAs and developers.<hr />- Systematic repository structure enables consistent tracking of database changes.<hr />- Continuous integration automates verification to preclude schema conflicts.<hr />- Refactoring manages schema changes and modifications in database access.<hr /><hr />Knowledge Sharing:<hr />- DBAs gain understanding through experience and collaboration.<hr />- Centralized knowledge base documents schema changes, dependencies, and updates.<hr />- Regular sessions educate developers on best practices and current changes.<hr />- Impact assessments guide change requests to mitigate risks.<hr /><hr />Database Repository Structure:<hr />- Centralizes management of database changes systematically.<hr />- Components: <hr />  - Schema definitions & migrations via versioned scripts.<hr />  - Configuration & credentials for secure database access.<hr />  - Change documentation for traceability.<hr />  - Version control systems (e.g., Git) for tracking and rollback.<hr /><hr />Continuous Integration:<hr />- Follows structured verification for every change:<hr />  1. Compatibility testing on schema changes.<hr />  2. Data migrations validated to avoid corruption.<hr />  3. Notifications for conflicts pre-deployment.<hr /><hr />Database Refactoring:<hr />- Updates schema and data while ensuring minimal disruption.<hr />- Non-breaking changes (e.g., new columns) are safe.<hr />- Breaking changes require transitional phases to maintain service functionality.<hr />  <hr />Summary:<hr />- Effective evolution requires clear communication, structured documentation, and proactive conflict management.<hr />- Utilizing version control and automation preserves database integrity amid system growth.<hr />- A well-maintained database repository is key for operational consistency and development clarity.

5.title: Frontend Report February 2025
5.description: Our February 2025 report covers what's new in frontend development - from React's move away from Create React App to Next.js improvements, browser compatibility updates, and cool new tools like React Scan. Get practical tips for better auth, faster websites, and making your sites work for everyone.
5.spr_content: - Create React App (CRA) deprecated; outdated technology.<hr />- Alternatives: Vite for fast builds, Next.js for server rendering.<hr />- React Context can lead to performance issues; consider smaller contexts or state libraries (Jotai, Zustand).<hr />- React Server Components allow for data streaming; differentiate from regular components.<hr />- React Query has trade-offs: large file size, complexity in cache management.<hr />- Vercel's Fluid Compute reduces AI costs; efficient request handling.<hr />- Next.js 15 enhances error handling; introduced specialized error files.<hr />- Double-keyed caching affects site speed negatively; prioritize user privacy.<hr />- Enhance accessibility with proper HTML, form design, and focus management.<hr />- Speed optimization: image compression, Gzip, smart caching, critical CSS.<hr />- JavaScript trends in 2025: serverless platforms, WebAssembly, microfrontends.<hr />- "Interop 2025" aims for consistent browser feature compatibility; new priorities for standardization.<hr />- React Scan identifies performance bottlenecks easily; no code modification needed.<hr />- Nue framework offers simplicity and reduced JS complexity; focuses on web fundamentals.<hr />- Standard Schema improves upon Zod for validation; better performance and compatibility.<hr />- Commentary on technology shifts: server-side practices, developer frustrations with linters, and the evolution of HTML.

6.title: Micro Frontends Microservices For Frontend Development
6.description: Micro Frontends is an architectural style where independently deliverable frontend applications are composed into a greater whole.
6.spr_content: - Micro-frontend: Architectural style for independently deliverable frontend applications composing a larger system.<hr />- Benefits:<hr />  - Cohesive, maintainable, smaller codebases.<hr />  - Scalable organizations with decoupled teams.<hr />  - Incremental upgrades and rewrites of frontend components.<hr />  - Simplified maintenance via focused and specialized repositories.<hr />  <hr />- Micro frontends in action:<hr />  - Build-time Integration: Each micro frontend published as a package, included in container as dependencies.<hr />    - JavaScript example illustrates dependencies and versioning.<hr />  - Run-time Integration via iframes: Utilizes iframes to load micro frontends.<hr />    - Complexity in responsiveness and routing challenges.<hr />  - Run-time Integration via JavaScript: Scripts load micro frontends, exposing global functions.<hr />    - Container determines which function to execute for rendering.<hr />  - Run-time Integration via Web Components: Defines micro frontends as custom HTML elements.<hr />    - Instant instantiation of components, with issues in server-side rendering and browser support.<hr /><hr />- Cross-application communication methods:<hr />  - Custom events.<hr />  - Routing mechanisms.<hr /><hr />- Server-side rendering: Challenging, can use Server Side Includes for specific page content.<hr /><hr />- Conclusion:<hr />  - Dependency duplication increases payload size.<hr />  - Potential performance impacts.<hr />  - Requires a learning curve.<hr />  - Best suited for medium to large projects.<hr /><hr />- References:<hr />  - Micro frontends and related articles/resources for in-depth understanding.

7.title: Optimizing initial load time for a Trading Platform
7.description: Discover the technical strategies behind optimizing a Binance trading platform, reducing initial load times to under 1 second for enhanced trader productivity.
7.spr_content: - Optimized frontend performance for a trading platform targeting Binance traders.<hr />- Primary issue: long initial load times, worsening with more accounts.<hr />- Sluggish performance negatively affected real-time trading responsiveness.<hr />- Achieved initial content display in under 1 second; full usability in approx. 1.5 seconds (improved from 2.5-3 seconds).<hr />- Importance of speed: traders need fast, real-time processing, often managing 50+ accounts.<hr />- Frontend performs real-time calculations but requires frequent page refreshes for updates, leading to delays.<hr />- Performance challenges: slow network connections and high rendering workload.<hr />- Slow network issue: excessive requests to Binance per account; hundreds of requests for many accounts.<hr />- Limitation of browser requests contributes to load time increases.<hr />- Slow rendering workload: large code to process and style; browser delays over 1 second.<hr />- Initial strategy: process data in background, but background worker delay proved problematic.<hr />- Focus shifted to reducing network delays and data handling at the outset.<hr />- Key Strategies:<hr />  - Enhanced backend API speed through caching, request batching, data compression, and combined WebSocket setup.<hr />  - Caching account data to minimize repetitive requests.<hr />  - Request batching to consolidate multiple account data requests into one.<hr />  - Data compression for faster transfers.<hr />  - Including WebSocket setup (`listenKey`) in the initial response to speed real-time connections.<hr />  - Caching processed data to skip background worker delays at initial load.<hr />  - Quickly revalidating data with a non-blocking call after displaying initial data.<hr />- Result: transformed a slow-loading platform into a fast, responsive tool.<hr />- Showed significant efficiency gains: initial display under 1 second and full usability in 1.5 seconds, amplifying trader satisfaction. <hr />- Conclusion emphasizes practical solutions (caching, batching, optimizing updates) over complex theories for effective performance enhancement in trading platforms.

8.title: Life at Dwarves
8.description: We build this company like we build a product. There are roadmaps for growth; there are phases; there are iterations. There might also be bugs, places where the company crashes because of bad organizational design, or cultural oversights.
8.spr_content: - Like-minded teammates pursuing ambitious goals within a tech culture and structured codes of conduct.<hr />- Company growth mirrors product development: roadmaps, phases, iterations; bugs and organizational design issues can occur.<hr />- Advocacy for change begins by enhancing individual capabilities.<hr />- **Benefits & Perks**:<hr />  - Education Allowance for continuous learning.<hr />  - Referral Bonus for recommending suitable candidates.<hr />  - Work Gear Supplies fund for work-related expenses.<hr />  - Travel Support for annual trips to Dwarves Hubs.<hr />  - Learning Sponsorship for shared knowledge input.<hr />  - Healthcare Package for comprehensive coverage.<hr />- Core value: Foster a culture of learning, viewing it as a key performance metric.<hr />- Diverse learning formats, including:<hr />  - Weekly Radio Talks for practice sharing.<hr />  - Dwarves Memo for key takeaways and demos.<hr />  - Dwarves Brainery as a comprehensive knowledge hub.<hr />  - Lecturer Training from academia.<hr />  - Monthly Tech Events with industry talents.<hr />  - TIL Channels for daily updates and tips.<hr />- Agile methodology employed across projects; products shipped with cutting-edge technology.<hr />- Development runs in sprints; V-model testing integrated.<hr />- [Dwarves Playbook] outlines teamwork ethics and engineering principles.<hr />- Community involvement is vital: turning knowledge into impactful products.<hr />- Active participation in tech communities and sponsorship of campaigns.<hr />- Highlighted community partners: Golang Vietnam, WeBuild Community, Techie Story, Startup.vn.

9.title: Talks and Takeaways from the Scene: Part 1
9.description: Talks and Takeaways from the Scene Part 1
9.spr_content: - Recent exposure to Vietnam's tech scene: two contrasting events.<hr />- **XDC Network Event**: Low energy; Web3 feels constrained, less wild, more corporate.<hr />- Web3's original excitement seems subdued; questioning evolution.<hr />- Terrance's insight: some builders focus on creation over events.<hr />- Investor interest in government-supported CEXes; optimistic about future funding.<hr />- Vietnam’s crypto inflows: $100 billion; major movement through centralized exchanges.<hr />- Government's motivation: <hr />  - Ensure regulatory compliance and security.<hr />  - Job creation and economic growth via exchanges.<hr />  - Foster innovation in technology.<hr />  - Increase tax revenue from crypto activities.<hr />  - Enhance Vietnam's global standing in crypto.<hr />  <hr />- **Startup Demo Night**: Vibrant atmosphere; AI innovations showcased.<hr />- Notable AI developments: solutions for operational efficiency, data processing.<hr />- Justin’s emotional AI tool; need for beta testers.<hr />- Eduardo's prompt-testing platform; seeks collaboration for development.<hr />- Jeremy’s business-focused data entry solution; demand for user testing in Vietnam.<hr />- AI adoption in Vietnam: 80% of businesses engaged, surpassing regional trends.<hr />- NVIDIA's R&D center promising future growth in local tech talent.<hr />- Mixed reception of some AI tools; both innovative and mundane developments noted.<hr />- Overall sentiment: optimism about Vietnam's evolving tech landscape and entrepreneurial spirit; anticipation for future advancements.

10.title: Building a complete tech system for small Vietnamese hotels
10.description: We helped Aharooms create a suite of digital tools that enables small hotels in Vietnam to improve operations, increase bookings, and boost revenue, especially during the challenging COVID-19 period when adaptation was crucial.
10.spr_content: - **Industry Context**: Hospitality in Vietnam; focus on small hotels (2-3 stars).<hr />- **Business Goal**: Develop tech tools to enhance competitiveness and adapt to challenges, especially post-COVID-19.<hr />- **Product Solution**: Integrated system with booking platform, management tools, revenue optimization features.<hr />- **Outcome**: Successful launch; gained market recognition; enabled small hotels to thrive during COVID.<hr />- **Technical Contributions**: Full-stack development; expertise in product development.<hr /><hr />### Technical Highlights:<hr />- **Backend**: Golang, Elixir for robustness.<hr />- **Frontend**: React.js, JavaScript, TypeScript for interactivity and responsiveness.<hr />- **Infrastructure**: Docker, Google Cloud, Kubernetes, Netlify for scalability.<hr />- **Monitoring Tools**: Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Sentry for system health.<hr />- **Database**: PostgreSQL, Redis for efficient data management.<hr />- **Architecture**: Monolithic design for speed and maintainability.<hr /><hr />### Challenges Identified:<hr />- Small Vietnamese hotels lack modern management solutions; inconsistent service and resources.<hr />- COVID-19 intensified need for digital adaptation and innovative business models.<hr />- Development hurdles with balancing new features and existing code fixes.<hr /><hr />### Development Strategy:<hr />- **Architecture**: Chose monolithic model for agility and simpler maintenance.<hr />- **Cloud Solutions**: Google Cloud setup with Docker and Kubernetes for data security and isolation.<hr />- **Performance**: Utilizing Netlify to prevent traffic bottlenecks, ensuring rapid user experience.<hr />- **QA Process**: Rigorous testing with multiple development environments for reliability.<hr />- **Data Insights**: Integrated PostgreSQL and Metabase for performance analytics.<hr /><hr />### Key Features Developed:<hr />- **Management Tools**:<hr />  - Booking platform similar to "Shopify for hotels."<hr />  - Centralized property management system (PMS).<hr />  - Daily operation and budget management tools.<hr />- **Customer Retention**:<hr />  - Loyalty system via "Ahacoin" for cashback rewards.<hr />  - Performance metrics visualization.<hr />  - Cancellation analysis for operational improvements.<hr />- **Revenue Optimization**:<hr />  - Advanced revenue management system (RMS).<hr />  - Integration with multiple booking platforms.<hr />  - Flexible booking options support.<hr /><hr />### Collaborative Approach:<hr />- Functioned as dedicated product team for Aharooms.<hr />- Regular workshops to align with Vietnamese hotel owners’ needs.<hr />- Agile feature adjustments based on market feedback.<hr />- Comprehensive support from design to deployment.<hr /><hr />### Achievements:<hr />- Launched a market-recognized product; positioned Aharooms as an industry innovator.<hr />- Developed a scalable platform with multiple revenue streams.<hr />- Simplified operations for hotel owners; enabled online bookings during COVID-19.<hr />- Created mechanisms for improved customer retention and revenue maximization.<hr /><hr />### Impact:<hr />- Empowered Aharooms to establish market presence and anticipated growth post-pandemic.<hr />- Facilitated significant operational enhancements for small hotel clientele, driving recovery and future resilience.

11.title: Redesigning BHD Cinema's ticket booking app for a better experience
11.description: We helped BHD Cinema transform their outdated mobile app into an intuitive platform that allows customers to easily browse movies, book tickets online, and enjoy a seamless cinema experience, turning movie-goers into loyal BHD fans.
11.spr_content: **Industry**: Entertainment  <hr />**Location**: Vietnam  <hr />**Business Context**: Popular cinema chain, frustrated users due to outdated, non-functional app.  <hr />**Solution**: Complete app redesign; intuitive user flows for ticket booking and movie discovery.  <hr />**Outcome**: Modern, easy-to-use app enhancing cinema experience for movie-goers.  <hr />**Service Provided**: Mobile app design / UI/UX improvement.  <hr /><hr />**Technical Highlights**:  <hr />- **UI Framework**: Modern mobile design frameworks implemented.  <hr />- **Typography**: Utilized Avenir Next font family for clarity.  <hr />- **Design System**: Established consistent components and cohesive color palette.  <hr />- **Interactive Elements**: Features like carousel navigation and user-friendly booking screens.  <hr /><hr />**Client**: BHD Cinema, leading in ticket sales in Vietnam, faced major digital experience challenges with an outdated app lacking online booking capability.  <hr /><hr />**Challenge**:  <hr />- Outdated visuals and interface inconsistencies.  <hr />- Inability for online ticket bookings.  <hr />- Poor navigation due to cluttered design.  <hr />- Essential information missing for customers.  <hr />- Desired transformation of user perception and loyalty cultivation.  <hr /><hr />**Design Approach**:  <hr />- Focused on core movie-goer needs for usability and aesthetics.  <hr />- **Intuitive Navigation**: Home screen showcases movies prominently; promotional content minimized.  <hr />- **Simplified Information**: Clear movie details with accessible booking button.  <hr />- **Streamlined Booking**: Reduced booking process steps with logical groupings of showtimes.  <hr />- **Digital Convenience**: Introduced digital tickets with QR codes; historical booking management system.  <hr /><hr />**Key Features**:  <hr />- **Home Screen & Movie Schedule**: User-friendly layout emphasizing movie content; improved carousel for browsing.  <hr />- **Movie Details**: Structured for quick interest evaluation; comprehensive film information included.  <hr />- **Showtime Selection**: Organized by date, location, and type, minimizing overload, emphasizing Today's shows.  <hr />- **Booking Flow**: Simplified and intuitive; quick reservation steps.  <hr />- **Transaction History**: Easy tracking of current and past bookings; digital tickets for entry efficiency.  <hr />- **Cinema Browsing**: "Book by cinema" feature enhances selection flexibility.  <hr />- **Theater Information**: Detailed descriptions and visuals of theater types enhancing customer expectations.  <hr /><hr />**Achievements**:  <hr />- Transformed user experience through an intuitive interface.  <hr />- Enabled online ticket bookings, reducing waiting times.  <hr />- Implemented digital ticket management and booking history system.  <hr />- Presented comprehensive, digestible movie and theater information.  <hr />- Fostered brand loyalty by enhancing customer engagement digital experience.  <hr />- Competitively positioned BHD Cinema in Vietnam's entertainment market.

12.title: Building a powerful crypto trading dashboard for professionals
12.description: We built Hedge Foundation, a powerful crypto trading dashboard that helps professional traders manage multiple accounts, track positions, and automate order execution in real-time across exchanges.
12.spr_content: - **Industry Context**: Financial Technology / Cryptocurrency; Global reach.<hr />- **User Need**: Unified system for professional crypto traders; managing multiple exchange accounts; executing strategies efficiently.<hr />- **Solution Developed**: Comprehensive all-in-one dashboard; synchronizes data across exchanges; automates trading functions.<hr />- **Outcome Achieved**: Significant reduction in management time for multiple trading accounts.<hr /><hr />- **Service Offerings**: <hr />  - Full-stack development.<hr />  - Financial system integration.<hr />  - Advanced data visualization.<hr /><hr />- **Technical Highlights**:<hr />  - **Performance**: Utilized AG Grid for handling large data tables with real-time updates.<hr />  - **Concurrency**: Implemented web workers for background processes, ensuring UI responsiveness.<hr />  - **Backend**: Developed using Elixir and Phoenix framework for robust API performance.<hr />  - **Data Collection**: Employed crawling systems utilizing Elixir’s Supervisor and GenServer for efficient data gathering.<hr />  - **Visualization Tools**: Integrated TradingView with custom indicators for tailored market analysis.<hr />  - **Architecture**: Designed as microservices with dedicated Balancer and Forwarder for data management.<hr /><hr />- **Case Study: Hedge Foundation**:<hr />  - Developed a trading dashboard for crypto traders to manage accounts, track positions, monitor balances, calculate PnL, and execute bulk orders efficiently.<hr />  - Addressed challenges such as data fragmentation, manual monitoring, execution speed, visualization deficiencies, and historical analysis needs.<hr />  <hr />- **Innovative Features**:<hr />  - Alarm system for real-time market notifications.<hr />  - Automated trading for rapid execution of strategies.<hr />  - Database for extensive historical data storage.<hr />  - Custom charting capabilities with user-defined indicators.<hr /><hr />- **Development Methodology**:<hr />  - Optimized for real-time performance and reliability.<hr />  - Engaged in continuous collaboration with founder for domain expertise.<hr />  - Weekly discussions, daily stand-ups, and collaborative tools (Discord, Basecamp, GitHub) to ensure aligned development.<hr /><hr />- **Achievement Summary**:<hr />  - Delivered a platform facilitating real-time monitoring and automated alerts.<hr />  - Enabled streamlined trade execution and comprehensive historical data for strategy optimization.<hr />  - Reduced management complexity; provided centralized oversight for traders.<hr />  - Continual expansion of integrations with more trading platforms to enhance user capabilities.<hr />  <hr />- **Value Proposition**: Demonstrated capability in creating complex financial systems that integrate real-time data, tailored visualizations, and automated workflows in the cryptocurrency trading domain.

13.title: Kafi: Making stock trading easier for everyone
13.description: We helped Kafi Securities rebuild their stock trading app to work better for both beginners and experienced traders, making investing more accessible for everyone.
13.spr_content: - **Industry**: Financial Services / Investment in Vietnam.<hr />- **Challenge**: Kafi Securities sought to modernize their trading app to retain professionals and attract new users.<hr />- **Solution**: Redesigned mobile trading platform featuring personalized user experiences based on skill levels.<hr />- **Outcome**: Enhanced app leading to improved user retention and tailored tools for various trader types.<hr />- **Services Provided**: UX/UI Design, User Research, Mobile App Redesign.<hr /><hr />### Technical Highlights<hr />- **User Research**: In-depth analysis of user behaviors, needs, and frustrations.<hr />- **Personalization**: Adaptive interfaces according to user experience (beginner, intermediate, advanced).<hr />- **Onboarding**: Streamlined process with progressive disclosure for easier registration.<hr />- **Education**: Integrated learning tools to support new investors.<hr />- **UI Design**: Modern interfaces with contextual help for assistance.<hr />- **Responsive Design**: Compatibility across various screen sizes and orientations.<hr /><hr />### Approach<hr />- **Collaboration with Kafi**: Direct partnership with leadership to identify user pain points and develop solutions.<hr />- **Three-Step Process**: Learn, Plan, Design.<hr />  <hr />### User Research Methodology<hr />- **Contextual Observation**: Users observed interacting with the app.<hr />- **Social Listening**: Analysis of user discussions on investment platforms.<hr />- **Competitive Analysis**: Evaluation of peer apps to identify strengths and improvement opportunities.<hr /><hr />### User Needs Identified<hr />- Quick access to stock prices and news.<hr />- Balance checking and position monitoring.<hr />- Alerts for significant market changes.<hr />- Capability to execute trades remotely.<hr /><hr />### Key Innovations Developed<hr />- **Experience-Based Personalization**: Three interface settings based on user skill level.<hr />- **Streamlined Onboarding**: Simplified steps and exploration prior to full verification, with demo accounts available.<hr />- **Educational Tools**: Tooltips, persistent help panels, interactive tutorials, simplified content.<hr /><hr />### Design Principles<hr />- **Modern, Minimalist Interface**: Clean design reducing cognitive load, emphasizing critical information.<hr />- **Consistent Patterns**: Uniform design elements throughout the application.<hr /><hr />### Collaborative Process<hr />- Engaged in regular workshops and user testing.<hr />- Continuous feedback loop with Kafi's team to align on goals and challenges.<hr /><hr />### Achievements<hr />- Increased registration completion rates due to improved onboarding.<hr />- Enhanced app engagement leading to more trades executed on mobile.<hr />- Accelerated learning for new investors through educational tools.<hr />- Advanced functionality for professional traders minimizing desktop reliance.<hr />- Unified platform that caters to all user experiences, simplifying maintenance and enhancing user experience.<hr />- Improved brand perception of Kafi as an innovative investment platform in Vietnam.<hr /><hr />### Conclusion<hr />The project exemplifies the significance of user-centric design in financial applications. By addressing diverse user needs through tailored research and innovative design, Kafi now facilitates accessible investing for all Vietnamese users while equipping experienced traders with necessary tools, supporting their mission to foster financial growth.

14.title: Building a central hub for food and beverage businesses in Singapore
14.description: We helped Momos, a pre-seed startup in Singapore, build their first MVP, a centralized data hub that simplifies online operations for food and beverage businesses through third-party integrations and data analytics.
14.spr_content: - **Industry**: Food & Beverage Technology in Singapore.<hr />- **Business Context**: Pre-seed startup (Momos) required rapid MVP development for market fit testing.<hr />- **Solution**: Centralized data platform integrating delivery services and analytics.<hr />- **Outcome**: Platform launched; first users onboarded successfully.<hr />- **Services Provided**: Full-stack development, integration development, DevOps.<hr />  <hr />### Technical Highlights:<hr />- **Backend**: Node.js for rapid development flexibility.<hr />- **Frontend**: React and Next.js for responsive UI.<hr />- **Database**: PostgreSQL with materialized views for reporting.<hr />- **Cloud Architecture**: AWS Lambda, EventBridge, CloudWatch for serverless infrastructure.<hr />- **Authentication**: Auth0 with OAuth 2.0 for secure access.<hr />- **Analytics**: Google Studio for visualization and reporting.<hr /><hr />### Partnership with Momos:<hr />- Founded by ex-Grab employee; simplifies online operations for F&B businesses.<hr />- Centralized hub for managing online presence across multiple services.<hr />- Onboarded a team of three developers remotely starting March 2021.<hr />- Development aimed to establish a future-proof, scalable foundation.<hr /><hr />### Challenge Faced:<hr />- F&B sector saw increased online operations during the pandemic, leading to fragmentation.<hr />- Businesses had to juggle multiple delivery platforms and social media accounts.<hr />- Lack of a unified view hindered data-driven decision-making.<hr />  <hr />### Solution Features:<hr />- **Third-party Integrations**: APIs for Grab, Foodpanda, Deliveroo; unified dashboard.<hr />- **Serverless Architecture**: Cost-efficient, automatic scaling, high availability.<hr />- **Report Generation**: Utilized GPT-3 for natural language summaries and custom reporting templates.<hr />- **Authentication System**: Ensured secure data synchronization and access.<hr /><hr />### Collaborative Approach:<hr />- Engineers distributed across Singapore, India, and Vietnam.<hr />- Clear communication channels: Daily sync-ups, Notion for task management, weekly logs.<hr />- Development emphasized rapid prototyping, iteration, and documentation.<hr /><hr />### Achievements:<hr />- Successful MVP launch; solid foundation for F&B management.<hr />- Features enable merchants to:<hr />  - Manage multi-platform delivery.<hr />  - Track online reputation.<hr />  - Deploy advertising campaigns easily.<hr />  - Generate data-driven business insights.<hr />- Key technical achievements:<hr />  - Scalable integration framework.<hr />  - Reliable data synchronization.<hr />  - Intuitive user interface.<hr />  - Automated reporting to save time.<hr /><hr />### Future Collaboration:<hr />- Ongoing partnership focuses on enhancing analytics and review management capabilities.<hr />- Aims to add value to users and accelerate growth in the F&B marketplace.

15.title: Building a community platform for Vietnamese Entrepreneurs
15.description: We helped create a digital hub where Vietnamese startup founders can connect, share knowledge, and access resources to grow their businesses.
15.spr_content: - **Industry Context**: Startup community and knowledge sharing in Vietnam; need for connection among entrepreneurs, investors, and resources.<hr />- **Solution**: Developed a comprehensive online community platform for Vietnamese startups.<hr />- **Impact**: Attracted thousands of users; facilitated valuable networking and resource sharing.<hr />  <hr />- **Service Overview**: Full-stack development focusing on a community platform with search integration.<hr />  <hr />- **Technical Highlights**:<hr />  - **Backend**: Node.js and Express for flexible API.<hr />  - **Frontend**: React.js and Next.js for responsive UX.<hr />  - **Database**: MongoDB for diverse content storage.<hr />  - **Search**: Elasticsearch for efficient content discovery.<hr />  - **Architecture**: Microservices for independent scalability.<hr />  - **Mobile Optimization**: Responsive design focused on smartphone users.<hr />  - **Security**: Strong authentication and permissions.<hr /><hr />- **Challenges Addressed**:<hr />  - **Information Fragmentation**: Resources dispersed across platforms.<hr />  - **Limited Networking**: Barriers for founders outside urban centers.<hr />  - **Knowledge Shortages**: New founders lacking mentorship and practical guidance.<hr /><hr />- **Development Strategy**:<hr />  - Built platform tailored to user needs and experiences.<hr />  - Engaged with StartupVN team for real-time feedback.<hr />  - Ensured fast, engaging user navigation and community features.<hr />  <hr />- **Key Features**:<hr />  - Forums for discussion and knowledge sharing.<hr />  - Event listings for networking.<hr />  - Resource libraries for guidance.<hr />  - User profiles for showcasing work.<hr />  - Mentorship connections linking experienced founders to newcomers.<hr /><hr />- **Achievements**:<hr />  - Rapid community growth and active user engagement.<hr />  - Improved access to resources for rural founders.<hr />  - Successful matches of startups with mentors and investors.<hr />  <hr />- **Future Growth**: Continuous updates and feature enhancements driven by community feedback; integral to Vietnam's startup ecosystem evolution. <hr /><hr />- **Quote**: "The platform has transformed how we support entrepreneurs in Vietnam." - Tuan Anh, Founder of StartupVN.<hr />  <hr />- **Conclusion**: Project exemplifies the role of digital platforms in empowering entrepreneurial communities and fostering economic development.

16.title: Weekly Consulting Snapshot #8: R1 1776 Goes Open-Source, Cardex Gets Hacked, and Grok-3 Debuts
16.description: R1 1776 Goes Open-Source, Cardex Gets Hacked, and Grok-3 Debuts
16.spr_content: - Technology accelerates; AI and blockchain lead the charge.  <hr />- AI advancements signify a leap in intelligent systems.  <hr />- Open-source R1 1776: unbiased, accurate, reliable due to Perplexity's enhancements.  <hr />- DeepSeek-R1 from a Chinese startup; previously biased; now transparent.  <hr />- LLMs aid code generation but require human oversight for accuracy.  <hr />- Perplexity Deep Research AI: deeper insights, idea linking, richer research capabilities.  <hr />- Limitations of LLMs: struggle with true reasoning, creativity, long-term planning.  <hr />- xAI's Grok-3 claims human-like reasoning; skepticism in the AI community.  <hr />- Blockchain innovations focus on security and adoption.  <hr />- HyperFND: democratizes NFT ownership through fractionalization and DeFi.  <hr />- Cardex exploit: $400,000 loss highlights urgent need for security in DeFi.  <hr />- Hong Kong aims for crypto leadership, exploring new digital asset products.  <hr />- Israeli blockchain security firm raises $50M, emphasizing protection in DeFi/Web3.  <hr />- Products shaping the future: Graphiti (AI knowledge graphs), RoadwayAI (traffic insights), 21st.dev (developer components marketplace), Wegic.ai (AI website creation), Builder.io (Figma to code).  <hr />- Conclusion: Rapid growth in AI and blockchain; importance of tracking trends for safe, innovative applications.

17.title: Weekly Consulting Snapshot #9: Bybit Loses $1.5B in Hack, Claude 3.7 Sonnet Drops, and OpenArt Designs Characters
17.description: Bybit Loses $1.5B in Hack, Claude 3.7 Sonnet Drops, and OpenArt Designs Characters
17.spr_content: - **Tech Updates Overview**: Categorized into Top Products, Blockchain, and AI.<hr /><hr />- **Top Products**:<hr />  - **GetBasalt.ai**: Automates tasks for businesses, enhancing growth efficiency. User-friendly for all company sizes.<hr />  - **Captiwate.com**: Creates engaging online content for marketers and creators. Simplifies digital marketing presence.<hr />  - **Nbulatest.ai**: Provides accessible AI news and tools for general audiences. Keeps users informed on AI developments.<hr />  - **OpenArt.ai/Characters**: Facilitates unique character creation through AI for various projects. Encourages creativity with ease.<hr />  - **Kaneo.app**: Open-source project management tool featuring customizable Kanban boards and team communication. Community-driven development.<hr /><hr />- **Blockchain**:<hr />  - **Bybit Hack**: Crypto exchange Bybit lost $1.5 billion but assures users of sufficient funds to cover losses. Highlights security risks in crypto.<hr />  - **SEC Drops Uniswap Case**: Potential positive regulatory shift for blockchain projects. Viewed as a win for the industry.<hr />  - **Moca Network & SK Planet's Oki Club**: Simplifies Web3 integration for businesses, improving accessibility to crypto for everyday users.<hr />  - **Binance's "Super Earn"**: New feature allowing users to lock crypto for rewards. Committed investment for higher returns.<hr />  - **Kredivo & Gajigesa Partnership**: $12 million deal to innovate blockchain lending in Southeast Asia. Integration of tech into finance.<hr /><hr />- **AI**:<hr />  - **DeepSeek-AI on GitHub**: Open-source AI tools available for modification and experimentation. Encourages community involvement.<hr />  - **Hacker News Innovations**: Diverse projects including Mech programming for robotics and Airweave for application searchability. Reflects creativity in tech.<hr />  - **Claude 3.7 Sonnet by Anthropic**: New chat-oriented AI aiming to compete with ChatGPT. Emphasis on performance and safety.<hr />  - **Grok 3 by xAI**: Advanced AI with voice capabilities, linked to Elon Musk's technological ambitions.<hr />  - **Apple Vision Pro AI Integration**: Upcoming AI enhancements for immersive experiences. Significant for Apple product users.<hr />  - **Nvidia Earnings Surge**: 80% revenue increase due to AI chip demand. Illustrates the impact of AI on technological growth.<hr /><hr />- **Final Thoughts**: Continuous evolution in technology with significant advancements in tools, regulatory shifts, and AI enhancements. Encouragement for further discussion on these updates.

18.title: Weekly Consulting Snapshot #3: AI’s Ubiquity at CES, Wall Street’s AI Boom, and Blockchain Innovations
18.description: Explore the impact of AI at CES 2025, Wall Street's AI-driven surge, and the fusion of blockchain and AI in emerging projects.
18.spr_content: - **CES 2025**: Showcased AI advancements; Nvidia CEO highlighted powerful AI chips for PCs; AI's presence in smart glasses, health-tracking rings, and home gadgets.<hr />- **AI Integration**: AI transforming everyday life; no longer a futuristic concept.<hr />- **Economic Impact**: AI driving Wall Street's bull run; S&P 500, Dow, Nasdaq near-record highs.<hr />- **Tech Leaders**: Nvidia surpassed $3 trillion market value, 170% gain; Tesla regained $1 trillion valuation; AI momentum is key market driver despite economic recovery factors.<hr />- **Networking Sector**: Companies like Broadcom, Cisco, Arista, and Marvell benefitting from AI-driven demand; essential for digital infrastructure supporting AI operations.<hr />- **Investment Banks**: Utilizing AI for efficiency; Goldman Sachs, JPMorgan, UBS automating tasks traditionally done by junior staff; shift enhances strategic focus.<hr />- **AI Job Trends in Australia**: 35% decline in AI job postings reflects market shifts; reasons include unmet ROI, talent saturation, preference for third-party solutions, tech sector slowdown, evolving skill demands.<hr />- **AI and Blockchain Fusion**: Emerging projects in 2025 combining AI with blockchain; initiatives like ai16z and meme-based *Fartcoin* indicative of creative exploration.<hr />- **Forbes Crypto Predictions**: <hr />  - **AI Agents on Blockchain**: Enhance transparency and trust; application in gaming and content creation.<hr />  - **SocialFi Growth**: Rise of cryptocurrencies with social utility; community-driven value creation.<hr />  - **Web3 Gaming Revival**: Decentralization helps reduce user acquisition costs; revitalizes gaming industry.<hr />  - **Broader Adoption**: Web3 reshaping traditional business models, promoting industry-wide engagement beyond just infrastructure improvements.

19.title: What's New in July 2021
19.description: Each month, we release a recap noting all the significant changes with our company and our team. July 2021 we will move toward blockchain industry and prepare for performance review in August.
19.spr_content: - **July Highlights**: Significant updates as we conclude July.<hr />- **Pandemic Alert**: Covid cases exceeding 100k; necessary to prioritize safety.<hr />- **WFH Shipment**: Completion of working from home equipment to enhance remote work setup since no annual trip.<hr />- **Fleeting Notes Reward**: Dwarves shared $1000 for contributions to the brainery; continued engagement appreciated.<hr />- **Office Hours**: Weekly Q&A with CEO on Fridays; support and guidance offered on various topics.<hr />- **Blockchain Engagement**: Partnership with Legend of Fantasy War; entry into NFT gaming.<hr />- **Notion OS**: Transition to Notion for documentation; categorized structure for improved accessibility.<hr />- **Upcoming Initiatives**: Study group for IoT and embedded applications led by Trung & Hieu; performance reviews commencing.<hr />- **Value Alignment**: Emphasis on personal growth and contribution to team goals; importance of understanding value fit.<hr />- **Hiring Focus**: Actively recruiting senior-level positions for team enhancement; referrals encouraged.<hr />- **Image Update**: Reminder to refresh social media profiles to reflect team identity.

20.title: 2022 In Review
20.description: Successfully went through 2022, a year that we might say -  a new record team reached highest growth record, kickstarted community engagement, home, compliance training & individual development are speeding up, and a whole new place to call Dwarves.
20.spr_content: - **2022 Highlights**: Record growth, community engagement, compliance training, individual development, and new workspace called Dwarves.<hr />- **Team Growth**:<hr />  - 30 new team members reached 80 total Dwarves.<hr />  - Strong culture maintained despite expansion; team approval system emphasizes collaboration.<hr />- **Leadership Structure**: Shift from traditional board to project-based leadership to adapt to hybrid work model and larger team.<hr />- **R&D Initiatives**: <hr />  - Establishment of R&D team for problem-solving across projects; successfully implemented Feature Flags for better DevOps and engineering processes.<hr />- **Learning Culture**: "Fastest Learners Win" mantra; opened learning initiatives to the tech community, enhancing skill sharing and continuous improvement.<hr />- **Business Growth**:<hr />  - 198% revenue growth; profitability amidst economic challenges.<hr />  - Investments in decentralized applications and blockchain partnerships for innovative technology solutions.<hr />- **Security Enhancements**: Implemented robust security measures concerning device, network, and location management.<hr />- **Gaming Department Initiation**: Launched after Summit 2022 to enhance team bonding through engaging tech-oriented games.<hr />- **Community Expansion**: Active participation in developer networks; multiple social media and streaming channels for knowledge sharing.<hr />- **Offline Events & Recognition**: Success of Coding Camp and awards in blockchain projects; community engagement through contests and hackathons.<hr />- **Workplace Development**: <hr />  - New Dwarves Hubs in Danang and Dalat for flexible, remote-friendly work environments.<hr />  - Initiatives like flight ticket reimbursement and project team dinners to enhance employee connectivity.<hr />- **Apprenticeship Growth**: Successful apprenticeship program led to skill development and increased leadership opportunities within Dwarves.<hr />- **Employee Compensation Innovations**: Introduction of $ICY token for rewarding community contributions and optional crypto salary payments.<hr />- **Strategic Hiring through Referrals**: Increased team size through an open referral program incentivizing internal and external suggestions.<hr />- **Vision for Dwarves 3.0**: Empowerment, mastery, meaning, and autonomy emphasized as core values to drive future growth and engineering culture.<hr />- **Momentum Forward**: 2022 marked a pivotal year, establishing a foundation for continuous improvement and contribution to impactful software development.

21.title: What's New in January 2022
21.description: Each month, we release a recap noting all the significant changes with our company and our team. January 2022 will go over performance review and our growth on projects, new year highlights.
21.spr_content: - **Project Overview**: Launch of MStation, first BSCS Metaverse blockchain game on Binance Smart Chain. Players engage in character summoning, mining missions, protection quests, and loot collection for play-to-earn.<hr />- **Team Expansion**: Current team of 6, led by Ngọc Thành, with Khai Le as part-time PM. Current upselling requests indicate a need for additional team members. Incentives for referrals offered.<hr />- **Performance Review Timeline**: Self-review notes received. 1-1 meetings scheduled post-Lunar New Year. Final performance results to be communicated before March.<hr />- **Brainery Initiative Resumption**: Resuming Brainery Repo in 2022; formatting and clean-up ongoing. New writing guidelines in development. Reward mechanism for presenters reinstated. Ops Team collecting notes for knowledge retention.<hr />- **Profit-Sharing & Bonuses**: Remittance via Viet Nam bank & TWise for those with 24+ months tenure. Profit-sharing reflects collective effort and is part of team culture. Updates available in Dwarves Handbook.<hr />- **Flight Ticket Policy**: Flight package for full-time members with 6+ months tenure. 4 trips/year; max reimbursement of 2,000,000 VND per trip. Destinations include Da Lat and Da Nang, with potential for Ha Noi soon. Booking receipts required for processing.<hr />- **Team Social Events**: Monthly sponsored team dinners to resume post-Covid, ensuring participation across HCMC, Hanoi, and Danang. Facetime options available for broader engagement. Ops will cover full expenses.<hr />- **Lunar New Year Gifts**: Delivery of gift sets to express gratitude and usher in the Year of the Tiger. Aiming for collective success in 2022.

22.title: 2024 In Review
22.description: Closing another milestone with 2024, it has been a year of building and rebuilding ,  strengthening what works, fixing what doesn’t, and uncovering new paths along the way. Every milestone reached this year carries the marks of teamwork and persistence.
22.spr_content: - Dwarves: 50% company, 50% community, dedicated to knowledge sharing.<hr />- 2024 marked a year of building, teamwork, and resilience; adapting to market shifts.<hr />- Core focus on AI integration: transforming experiments into daily tools.<hr />- 335 memo entries demonstrate commitment to knowledge sharing; memo.d.foundation acts as a team knowledge hub.<hr />- Weekly OGIF sessions foster learning, with 37 sessions focused on diverse tech topics.<hr />- ICY rewards incentivize engagement; total of 6,660 ICY distributed, focusing on trending fields (AI/LLM, Golang, etc.).<hr />- Team copilots streamline workflows with user-built practical tools; simplicity is key.<hr />- Internal tools upgraded (Tonobot, Fortress, Mochi) enhance collaboration and tracking.<hr />- Weekly commentary series expand from Go insights to broader tech-driven discussions.<hr />- AI Club fosters innovation and practical AI tool development; promotes community engagement.<hr />- Structured research on 40 promising tech topics, enhancing focus on real-world impact.<hr />- Integrations among tools (Notion, Slack) improve workflow efficiency.<hr />- Welcomed new team members, solidifying growth and skills expansion to respond to market needs.<hr />- Shift to hourly billing provides flexibility for clients; refining services aligns with market demands.<hr />- Building connections in Vietnam’s tech ecosystem, poised for significant growth.<hr />- Community culture promotes learning via OGIF and memo contributions, enhancing team cohesion.<hr />- Successful offline meet-up strengthened community bonds; shared insights and networking.<hr />- Deepened commitment to open source; projects drive innovation within the community.<hr />- Flexible office environment designed for productivity; perks enhance employee experience.<hr />- Introduced Peeps NFTs as tokens of recognition; foster community spirit and engagement.<hr />- Team-building retreat in Penang reinforced connections; trust in team dynamics favored success.<hr />- Overall, 2024 journey towards knowledge and innovation sets stage for 2025 explorations.

23.title: Navigating changes
23.description: The last tech cycle is ending, and we're already in the new normal. We are not in the best shape to compete with certain competitors, especially with a new market meta emerging. We are now in a future of new automation paradigms via AI and assets are moving on-chain.
23.spr_content: 1. Innovation is a core motivation; focus shifts from maintenance to value-driven projects.  <hr />2. Global competition in technology demands top-tier talent; some are lagging behind.  <hr />3. Recent AI and blockchain opportunities missed due to lack of project leadership; imbalanced workloads evident.  <hr />4. Easy money during ZIRP fosters complacency; results over past achievements are necessary for adaptation.  <hr />5. The previous tech cycle has ended; the new normal presents emerging market challenges.  <hr />6. Global shift towards AI and on-chain assets; traditional software demand is declining.  <hr />7. Need to regroup and focus on growth strategies moving forward.  <hr />8. **Consulting Team:** Engagement not guaranteed; non-contributing members may face changes, including breaks for skill improvement.  <hr />9. **Lab Team:** Central role preserved with heightened emphasis on innovation; increased rewards for active contributions expected.  <hr />10. New lab hires must excel in exploration, writing, and application of ideas.  <hr />11. **Community:** Strength in relationships; maintain Dwarves brand legacy.  <hr />12. Discord as a learning hub; alumni to receive permanent @d.foundation email aliases.  <hr />13. **Recap:**   <hr />   - Innovation market evolving; target customers shifting to Blockchain, AI, Data.  <hr />   - Changing consulting member requirements; non-contributors may need to adapt within 15/30 days or face breaks.  <hr />   - Team leaders will curate their strongest teams (A-teams).

24.title: What's New in August 2024
24.description: Each month, we release a recap highlighting key updates and progress within our team and community. August updates highlight AI tools, enhanced community discussions, the sum command upgrade, Go enterprise MOC insights, and earning dfg tokens through contributions.
24.spr_content: - **AI's Influence:** Tools like **Cursor** and **Claude 3.5 Sonnet** are revolutionizing programming by transitioning manual coding to AI-assisted environments.<hr />- **Generative Apps:** AI capabilities allow for the creation of mini apps from simple prompts, enhancing the app development landscape.<hr />- **Efficiency Gains:** Amazon's GenAI assistant reduces upgrade times and costs, automating 79% of code reviews.<hr />- **Prompt Caching:** Anthropic’s technology reduces costs by 90%, important for applications requiring repeated contexts, like chatbots.<hr />- **Structured Outputs:** OpenAI mandates adherence to JSON schemas, elevating standards in industries like healthcare and finance.<hr />- **UI Development Acceleration:** Tools like **shadcn** and **v0.dev** enhance frontend development with AI-driven prototyping.<hr />  <hr />- **Community Engagement Growth:** Introduction of monthly learning activities has stimulated real discussions and contributions within memo notes and OGIF office hours.<hr />- **Fortress Bot Feature:** New feature enhances visibility of available ICY for team engagements.<hr />- **Acknowledgments:** Recognition of key contributors in the community promotes ongoing collaboration and engagement.<hr />  <hr />- **Enhanced `sum` Command:** The upgraded **`sum` command** delivers quicker summaries highlighting key insights and knowledge nuggets.<hr />- **Go Enterprise MOC:** Phat Nguyen's compilation provides insight into utilizing Golang for addressing enterprise challenges, with ongoing commentary shared weekly.<hr />  <hr />- **dfg Token Evolution:** The **dfg token** is now a reward mechanism for team contributions, transitioning from a private stock concept to a community incentive, related to ICY coins. ICY will be integrated into future token earnings.

25.title: What's New in November 2024
25.description: In November, we sharpened our focus with advancements in platform engineering, introduced streamlined service packages, elevated ICY rewards for impactful contributions, and embraced key insights from market shifts, all building momentum as we gear up for our Penang retreat.
25.spr_content: - **Building Smarter Systems:** Focus on platform & data engineering; creating a second brain for enhanced decision-making and knowledge sharing.<hr />- **OGIF Weekly Sharing:** Updates aligned with team priorities; fostering deeper learning through focused, collaborative sessions.<hr />- **AI Copilot Tools:** Streamlining work processes with AI tools; enhancing team productivity and collaboration.<hr />- **Market Adaptation:** Addressing client demands; focus on Blockchain, Data, Platform, and AI/LLM skills.<hr />- **Market Insights:** Continuously tracking trends; delivering weekly updates to maintain team alignment and responsiveness.<hr />- **New Service Offerings:** Tailored service packages designed around client needs; focus on practical, impactful solutions.<hr />- **Increased ICY Rewards:** Recognizing quality contributions in knowledge sharing; incentivizing impactful inputs with higher rewards.<hr />- **Networking Opportunities:** Engaging with industry through summits and meetups; cultivating valuable relationships and insights.<hr />- **Company Retreat in Penang:** Scheduled for December 14-17, 2024; combining team bonding with cultural and recreational experiences.<hr />- **Open Positions:** Recruitment ongoing for Full-stack Engineer, Marketing Executive, and Business Development roles; invitation to join the team.

26.title: What's New in September 2024
26.description: Each month, we roll out a recap of our team and community's strides forward. September's updates spotlight the AI Club launch, rewards for our sharing culture, hybrid work check-ins, reporting tech trends in forward engineering, and our Mid-Autumn celebration.
26.spr_content: - AI-Club launched as a hub for AI/LLM exploration and collaboration. <hr />- Focus on productivity through building AI agents and projects. <hr />- Copilot Bounties offer rewards for impactful AI contributions.<hr />- Monthly rewards culture established with $4000 pool, prioritizing AI/LLM contributions.<hr />- Contributions include tech links, OGIF talks, and open-source projects.<hr />- Triple rewards for AI/LLM-related inputs incentivize knowledge sharing.<hr />- Return to office with automated check-ins to foster team connectivity.<hr />- Check-in rewards with ICY as a morale booster, thanking contributors.<hr />- Q3 tech roundup highlights advancements in LLM prototyping and tools.<hr />- Key insights on structured outputs, Golang updates, and blockchain exploration.<hr />- Mid-Autumn Festival celebrated with mooncakes, emphasizing tradition and connection.

27.title: Culture Test
27.description: Here's the culture test created during the market challenges of late 2024. It is designed to highlight and reinforce the cultural values at Dwarves Foundation. It’s a chance to reflect, share, and show how you fit into our team.
27.spr_content: - Culture test for Dwarves: Focuses on cultural values amidst late 2024 challenges.<hr />- Goal: Understand collaboration and contributions; honesty and alignment with Dwarves Foundation spirit emphasized.<hr />- Scoring: 60+ points considered qualified; emphasis on genuine responses over scores.<hr />- Language options: Responses in Vietnamese or English allowed.<hr />- Submission format: Multiple Markdown files (.md); submit via gist.github.com link.<hr /><hr />1. **Warm-Up (10 pts)**:<hr />   - Choose a reflective prompt; options include prideful moments, influential people, health choices, personal tears, or mastery achievements.<hr /><hr />2. **Culture (20 pts)**:<hr />   - Select one topic:<hr />     a) _Pressure makes diamonds:_<hr />        - Personal experience: Stress leading to success.<hr />        - Reflection: Value of adversity in growth.<hr />     b) _Like attracts like:_<hr />        - Personal experience: Connections built on shared values.<hr />        - Reflection: Influence of environment on personal behavior.<hr />     c) _No mud, no lotus:_<hr />        - Personal experience: Growth from difficult experiences.<hr />        - Reflection: Necessity of struggle for enlightenment.<hr /><hr />3. **Knowledge (30 pts)**:<hr />   - Roles in design, development, sales, project management, and leadership leveraging LLMs to enhance workflows.<hr />   - Provide demonstration or example of application.<hr /><hr />4. **Productivity (40 pts)**:<hr />   - Choose one:<hr />     a) Identify and implement relevant productivity technique for position.<hr />     b) Design workflow or agent using Dify.<hr /><hr />5. **Optional (Bonus 10 pts each)**:<hr />   - a) Use LLMs for rapid learning in new domains, provide an example.<hr />   - b) Leverage LLMs to identify knowledge gaps or uncover unknowns.

28.title: Weekly Digest #10: From lean to learner
28.description: Double digits, I can't believe we've reached our 10th digest! It's been quite a journey putting together each edition and a blast creating these for you. When we talk about memo, we're highlighting an essential part of our learning culture. We’ve just noted a few updates for the cycle ahead. Now, let's dive into this round-up.
28.spr_content: - **10th Digest Milestone**: Celebrating the journey of 10 editions; focus on learning culture.<hr />- **Memo as a Resource**: Central hub for team/community learning about tech and more; seeks contributions on memo.d.foundation.<hr />- **Incentives for Contributions**: Monthly pool of 3000 ICY (~4500 USDC) available for contributors; encourages participation through Discord engagement.<hr />- **Increased ICY Rewards**: Boosted ICY reward for shared software developments to 1 ICY per link; includes **💡・til** channel, friendly competition every Friday.<hr />- **AI Evolution**: Apple’s WWDC 2024 emphasizes AI’s growing integration in daily life; partnership with OpenAI enhances Siri.<hr />- **Health Checkup Reminder**: Annual health checkup for Dwarves scheduled in June; communication via Discord channel for inquiries.<hr />- **VN-Index Market Fluctuations**: Recent sell-off led to 21.6 point decline; market driven by investment psychology and lack of news; strategy crucial.<hr />- **EURO 2024 Excitement**: Matches begin June 14th; community engaged in predictions and camaraderie around upcoming games.<hr />- **Gratitude for Participation**: Thanks to members for sharing knowledge; call for continuous improvement in community engagement.

29.title: Weekly Digest #11: Come grow with us
29.description: Things are always cooking on our Discord. So grab a virtual seat at our table, pour yourself a cup of something tasty, and read the digest. If you're reading this, why not pop into the woodland and say hello? We'd love to meet you.
29.spr_content: - Discord community engagement thrives; virtual openness invites interaction.<hr />- Weekly updates from memo.d.foundation highlight significant growth in publications.<hr />- Noteworthy contributions: <hr />  - Dynamic Liquidity Market Maker on Solana by @huymaius.<hr />  - Introduction of Solana Token 2022 standard.<hr />  - Effective communication tips for ChatGPT by @minhcloud.<hr />- ICY rewards incentivize publishing and knowledge sharing; contributions welcome.<hr />- Fleeting notes reintroduced for concise tech insights; monthly 3000 ICY pool for contributors.<hr />- Surge in tech sharing evident; additional support through designated channels.<hr />- Annual health check-up reminders for Ho Chi Minh City; deadlines extended to July 15.<hr />- New t-shirt designs available at HadoHQ; limited-edition items encouraged.<hr />- Discussion of potential 30% profit through Uniswap yield farming; insights shared by @phucld.<hr />- Econ-café deep dive on TCB bonus shares and market implications led by COO @nikki.<hr />- Birthday celebrations for @tieubao and @minhlq; community support highlighted.<hr />- Emphasis on positivity and community enjoyment at the close of the dispatch.

30.title: Weekly Digest #13: More than lines of code
30.description: Welcome to this week's edition of our roundup, where we highlight the moments that make us more than just lines of code. This week, we're jet-setting around the world with our team's summer adventures, introducing new memo features, cheering for a beloved teammate's new chapter in the US, and celebrating new born. From beachside workspaces to anime figurine collections, we've got it all.
30.spr_content: - Weekly roundup: highlighting team culture beyond code. <hr />- Summer adventures: global locations, personal touches, team experiences. <hr />- Memo Tools: <hr />  - Streamlined submission for all team members. <hr />  - Commands: `?memo pr`, `?memo list` for updates. <hr />  - Discord webhook notifications for new PRs.<hr />  - Fleet notes submission via Discord; ICY distribution automation. <hr />  - Call for increased contributions; collective team engagement encouraged.<hr />- Summer snapshots: showcase diverse work environments and personal interests from Swiss mountains to anime collections. <hr />- Farewell to teammate Hieu Phan: cherished memories in Vietnam, embarking on a journey in the US, maintaining team connections. <hr />- Celebrating new birth: congratulations to @thanh on family addition; team camaraderie with playful anticipation for future announcements. <hr />- Digest reflects team spirit: sharing memos, moments, and milestones enriches community.

31.title: Weekly Digest #14: Embracing hybrid work - the best of both worlds
31.description: Discover how Dwarves embraces hybrid working, blending flexibility with in-person connections. Learn how our office space fosters productivity, learning, and real collaboration, even if it’s just for a day or two a week.
31.spr_content: - Dwarves values flexibility in work environment; hybrid model fosters collaboration.<hr />- Office serves as a hub for learning, sharing, and renewed energy.<hr />- Distinction of Dwarves office: support for varying work preferences; not every environment suits everyone.<hr />- Workspaces designed for comfort and adaptability; equipped with high-quality tech and furniture.<hr />- Productivity enhanced with perks: high-speed internet, quiet rooms, meal subsidies, and 24/7 access.<hr />- Daily office check-in incentivized with 5 ICY tokens; promotes engagement and presence.<hr />- Real-world interactions facilitate spontaneous knowledge sharing; learning is organic and experiential.<hr />- Team members motivated to return by enriched connections and opportunities for face-to-face engagement.<hr />- Testimonials highlight effectiveness of mentor culture, improved focus, and balanced work-life integration.<hr />- Office culture emphasizes smart work over hard work; collaborative idea sharing leads to growth.<hr />- Early adopters of the office environment find increased productivity and community feel.<hr />- Collective growth emphasized; goal is to create a supportive ecosystem for all team members.

32.title: Weekly Digest #15: New year Gathering: Sharing Tết, starting strong
32.description: Tết break came to an end, and the Dwarves team reunited to share stories, reconnect, and kick off the Year of the Snake in style. We brought it all back to Discord, along with a little SOL & ICY drop to start the year right.
32.spr_content: - Community gathering post-Tết.<hr />- Airdrop of SOL and ICY tokens.<hr />- Reintegration of community in Dwarves culture.<hr />- Discord activity with Tết stories and updates.<hr />- Shift from tech talk to personal anecdotes.<hr />- Discussions about lucky money, family gatherings, and food comas from bánh chưng and bánh tét.<hr />- Sharing of experiences with traditional New Year games.<hr />- Engagement in late-night card games with competitive spirits.<hr />- Photo sharing of diverse holiday experiences: beaches, mountains, reunions, and feasts.<hr />- Travel explorations versus returning to comforting familiarity.<hr />- Emphasis on reconnecting with family and tradition during the break.<hr />- Some participants focused on relaxation and personal time.<hr />- Transition back to work with renewed energy.<hr />- Introduction of the Year of the Snake.

33.title: Weekly Digest #6: Come for the conversation, stay for the culture
33.description: Hi, it’s @innno again. Summer is almost here. But don't worry, this update is all about making your day more comfortable. Now, onto this week’s updates.
33.spr_content: - Upcoming community meet-up in Ho Chi Minh City on May 31; includes news, tech talks, food, and fun.<hr />- Out-of-town members can request support via the support-ticket channel.<hr />- Changes in ICY distribution: more activities & 100 ICY rewards for newborns.<hr />- Last OGIF featured Factory Pattern, State Machines, and trading insights; @quang recognized for trading skills.<hr />- Promotions: @hnh as Chief of Staff, @minh_cloud as Junior Product Manager & Executive Assistant.<hr />- HadoHQ bustling with regular members and a family reunion vibe; monthly gatherings celebrated with food and drinks.<hr />- @lap's wedding marks significant personal events; @vincent proposes exploring Ninh Thuan province.<hr />- Reminder about cyber security following @nam's credit card hack; encourages vigilance with online links and bank accounts.<hr />- GPT-4o launches with fast response times and improved functionalities; generates human-like speech.<hr />- Community engagement and shared experiences emphasized as seasons and activities change.

34.title: Weekly Digest #9: A little more speed for summer
34.description: How quickly the first half of the year speeds up before it slows down. It’s really the second half of 2024 already. Time flies when you're having a blast. Get ready to rewind and relive some of the awesome highlights from the last week, get pumped for the epic things we'll do together before this year is over.
34.spr_content: - Time perception shifts as the first half of the year accelerates into the second half of 2024. <hr />- Anticipate reflections on recent highlights and upcoming experiences.<hr />- Gratitude expressed for community meet-up despite adverse weather conditions; strong turnout fueled energy and connection.<hr />- Last week’s activities included café conversations, BBQ enjoyment, and a wedding celebration, enhancing camaraderie.<hr />- Concerns arise about GenAI's impact on software engineering careers; mixed developer reactions to AI software engineer, Devin.<hr />- Constructive perspective: GenAI can streamline basic coding tasks, allowing human developers to hone complex skills and embrace richer career prospects.<hr />- Adoption of rewards system in the 💻・tech channel, incentivizing knowledge sharing and engagement through ICY rewards.<hr />- Celebrations for personal milestones and achievements, fostering community bonds and support; joyful wishes for new beginnings.<hr />- Reminiscing on cherished moments shared among team members, emphasizing the value of laughter and joy.<hr />- Encouragement to explore previous highlights for continuity and nostalgia.

35.title: Forward Engineering 2022
35.description: We want to demonstrate and encourage individual and organizational learning, where both gaining and sharing knowledge is prioritized, valued, and rewarded. Learning is an ongoing process that never ends in our fast-moving industry.
35.spr_content: - **Learning Culture:** Dwarves Foundation prioritizes learning and innovation within the organization.<hr />- **Growth Mindset:** Emphasizing belief in personal growth through experience and study.<hr />- **Encouragement of Questions:** Fostering an environment where asking questions and admitting ignorance is welcomed.<hr />- **Cross-Department Collaboration:** Opportunities beyond typical roles, e.g., conferences and new projects.<hr />- **Knowledge Sharing:** Every employee is valued as a teacher, sharing knowledge formally and informally.<hr />- **Supportive Framework:** Commitment to provide necessary tools, education, and training for success.<hr />- **Learning Events:** <hr />  1. **Monday's Radio Talk:** Platform for sharing thoughts on various topics.<hr />  2. **Friday's Showcase:** Weekly presentations of recent work.<hr />  3. **Brainery:** Focused on fostering a habit of public learning and improvement.<hr />  4. **R&D Topics:** Hub for tackling common challenges and promoting continuous learning.<hr />  5. **Dwarves Rewind:** Curated weekly list of industry news and discussions.<hr />  <hr />- **Brainery Development:** Evolved since August 2021, significant growth of the knowledge graph noted.<hr />- **Trending Tags:** Reflecting interests in frontend, backend, data, and community contributions.<hr />- **New Contributors Recognition:** Acknowledgment of individuals enriching the knowledge base.<hr />- **R&D Initiatives:** Addressing common challenges like multilingual application support, database management, and concurrency.<hr />- **Completed Challenge:** Implementation of **Feature Flags** for managing application features.<hr />- **Emerging Challenges:** Focus on cryptocurrency systems, Layer 2 designs, and blockchain support.<hr />- **Research Topics:** Ongoing exploration within Software Design, including database strategies and modeling practices.<hr />- **Dwarves Rewind:** Weekly aggregate of trending topics, industry changes, and reflective queries.<hr />- **Future Questions:** Continuous pondering on the impact of technological advancements and their socio-economic implications, such as job security in tech layoffs and the legality of training AI on copyrighted material.

36.title: Forward Engineering Quarter 3, 2024
36.description: In Q3/2024 Forward Engineering, we explore new tech stacks, engineering excellence, and key trends from the tech market over the past three months, with a focus on AI. Learn about tools like Dify, LangGraph, RAG, and more as we share our experiments and insights. Whether you’re interested in AI-driven workflows or tech market trends like the surge in AI startups and hiring demand.
36.spr_content: - **Dwarves' Mission:** Technology passion, creation, study, testing, open-source, innovation for all.<hr />  <hr />- **Forward Engineering Issue:** Explores experiments with tech stacks, insights on engineering excellence, reflections on tech market trends. AI remains central in discussions.<hr /><hr />- **Tech Radar Highlights:**<hr />  - **Dify (Adopt):** Open-source platform for LLM applications; simplifies workflow orchestration, intuitive design, rapid prototyping.<hr />  - **LangGraph (Assess):** Library for stateful, multi-actor LLM applications; enhances task division and agent management through graph structuring.<hr />  - **RAG (Adopt):** Retrieval-Augmented Generation enhances AI with external data; integrates proprietary information efficiently into LLM models.<hr />  - **LangSmith (Trial):** Focus on production reliability; features debugging and automated testing capabilities, still in early adoption phase.<hr />  - **Cursor (Assess):** AI-enhanced IDE inspired by VS Code; boosts coding efficiency, context awareness, still requires further exploration.<hr />  - **Devbox (Trial):** Simplified development environments without Docker; enhances developer experience, needs some Nix familiarity.<hr />  - **Shadcn/ui (Trial):** Modular, customizable UI components; speeds up development, maintains consistency through Tailwind.<hr /><hr />- **Tech Trends (Q3 2024):** <hr />  - Surge in tech layoffs, indicating long-term market restructuring.<hr />  - Shift towards "boring" tech, monolithic architectures, Full Stack development emphasizes stability.<hr />  - Job competition high; AI tools increasingly essential in coding processes.<hr /><hr />- **AI's Impact:** AI transforming programming practices, reducing costs, enabling solo ventures, emergence of "AI employees," need for AI skill proficiency in hires.<hr /><hr />- **Y Combinator Insight:** 72% of current startups focus on AI; trend indicates fundamental shift in business operations, with AI as differentiator.<hr /><hr />- **Future Considerations:** <hr />  - Data ownership crucial for competitive advantage; regulating data use in training essential.<hr />  - AI integration leads to new job roles centered around supervision and ethics.<hr /><hr />- **Further Reading:**<hr />  - Various technical insights, design patterns, programming language observations, and ongoing trends in the tech and AI landscape.

37.title: Dwarves Tech Radar Volume 01
37.description: For this edition, the theme is to get the whole team used to the concept of a central knowledge base, every study to expand our view to the tech scene counts. The design team also has a place to contribute and discuss their practices.
37.spr_content: - **Dwarves Tech Radar**: Launched January 2020; first written exploration of tech trends.<hr />- **Objective**: Establish a central knowledge base; involve the entire team, including design.<hr />- **Volume 01**: Ten reports on key technologies and practices.<hr /><hr />### Language & Framework<hr />- **WebAssembly**: Enhances web app performance; critical for multimedia tasks.<hr />- **Progressive Web App (PWA)**: Combines capabilities of native apps and web apps; single codebase for all devices.<hr />- **Three.js**: Library for 3D animations; utilized in audio visualization projects.<hr />- **Istio**: Service mesh with complex features; adoption on hold due to current infrastructure limits.<hr />- **SwiftUI**: Declarative UI framework; early-stage development for iOS 15 projects.<hr />- **XPC Service**: Manages inter-process communication; improves app resilience and security.<hr /><hr />### Practices & Approach<hr />- **Software Reusability**: Focuses on leveraging existing systems; reduces costs and accelerates delivery.<hr />- **CLI Assistant**: A tool to streamline code information retrieval; aids in debugging.<hr />- **Gestalt UI Principles**: Framework for UI design focusing on usability and performance; encourages creative freedom.<hr />- **Go-routine**: Central to Go's concurrency model; enhances system performance.<hr />- **Applied Security in SSH, SSL, Blockchain**: Emphasizes understanding security beyond frameworks; highlights responsibility in implementation.<hr />- **AARRR Funnel**: Metrics-driven approach to product development; minimizes risks associated with business goals.<hr />- **Blockchain for Designers**: Focuses on transparency and efficiency; crucial for UX design to facilitate user adoption.<hr />- **Remote UX Testing**: Adapts usability testing to remote settings; enhances user experience despite challenges.<hr /><hr />### Future Directions<hr />- Continuous improvement through contributions and feedback; emphasizes innovation, craftsmanship, and teamwork.<hr />- Tech Radar as a living document; updates to follow emerging trends and technologies.<hr />- Commitment to employee education on latest developments; aims for business competitiveness.

38.title: Build your knowledge base
38.description: In an age where Large Language Models like ChatGPT offer instant access to a universe of information, it raises the question, does our own personal knowledge base still hold any value, and is building a personal knowledge base still a legitimate thing to do?
